Carla/Don/Anita stuff

Here is some material which may be useful to you as you put things together for the 27th. Use it as you will. Sorry I can't be with you. If Carla is able to attend, please tell her that I send my regrets and will make up for it by carving her initials on something significant. Enjoy!
